Name: Corpse Reviver No.1 (Savoy recipe)
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Dry and potent. A 'pick-me-up' hangover cure - or possibly put-you-right-back-down-again!
History: Generally credited to Frank Meier, bar manager at the Ritz Bar in Paris during the 1920s and 30s, although he makes no claim to the drink in his 1936 The Artistry of Mixing Drinks . This recipe is adapted from Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Corpse Reviver No.1 (Savoy recipe) contains 191 calories
